name: FuturisTea
description:
An interactive story designed, written, and drawn by Timea and Charline for the IGGI Game Jam 2022. 

For the Global Game Jam 2021, we made a game about a tea shop owner, Mari, and her niece Selina, and their everyday running of their business. This year, we made the prequel, in which YOU decide what the shop looked liked throughout three generations of owners, before Mari inherited it!
